search.query: `easm_index` url="$urlToken$" sourcetype="easm:http_service" | dedup url | fillnull value="" screenshot_bytes | eval load_time_ms=round(time,2) | table _time, easm.entity, url, hostname, title, webserver, port, status_code, location, load_time_ms, failed, lines, method, scheme, words, hash.body_md5, a{}, screenshot_bytes | rename a{} as a_records, location as redirect_location, screenshot_bytes as base64, hash.body_md5 as body_md5 | rename easm.entity as entity
`easm_index` url="$urlToken$" sourcetype="easm:http_service" | dedup url | table input, tech{}, webserver, knowledgebase{} | rename *{} as *

`easm_index` sourcetype="easm:web_tech_scan" [ search index="easm" url="$urlToken$" sourcetype="easm:http_service" | eval url = url."*" | rename url as matched-at | fields matched-at] | rename matched-at AS matched_at, info.name AS info_name | eval matched_at = case(match(matched_at,"^http"),matched_at,match(matched_at,":443"),"https://".matched_at,match(info_name,"SSL"),"https://".matched_at, 1=1,matched_at) | sort -_time | rename *{} as * | table info_name, matcher-name, extracted-results, matched_at
`easm_index` url="$urlToken$" sourcetype="easm:http_service" | dedup easm.entity url | table headless_body
